title: IBM watsonx Code Assistant
introduction: IBM watsonx Code Assistant is a portfolio of generative AI products for code and content creation. You can use pretrained models based on specific programming languages to generate code with trust, security, and compliance.

links.title: Setting up your watsonx Code Assistant for Red Hat Ansible Lightspeed service in IBM Cloud
